Name: Waifu Love
About the game: Waifu Love is a casual puzzle game where you need to play puzzles like clicker, match game etc. * 10 original waifus * 3 tasks to unlock uncensored pic and animation (of the same pic) of each girl * Good soundtrack * Full HD (1920x1080p) * 10 achievements Artwork Commands: Mouse scroll up/down = zoom in/out Animation Commands: right arrow: 200% speed left arrow : 100% speed ESC: close animation Cheat Mode: Press 'C' to finish the lvl that you're playing. Disclaimer: All characters are over 18 years old.
Meta Title: Waifu Love: Nov 27, 2020, Mechanic Cloud and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Waifu Love? Check out the release date (Nov 27, 2020), developer insights from Mechanic Cloud, and a complete game summary.
